description: Returns a list of all insights checked for against the specified cluster. You can filter which insights are returned by category, associated Kubernetes version, and status.

parameters.name: clusterName
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon EKS cluster associated with the insights.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The criteria to filter your list of insights for your cluster. You can filter which insights are returned by category, associated Kubernetes version, and status. categories (list) --- The categories to use to filter insights. (string) --- kubernetesVersions (list) --- The Kubernetes versions to use to filter the insights. (string) --- statuses (list) --- The statuses to use to filter the insights. (string) ---

nested_params.name: categories
nested_params.description: The categories to use to filter insights.

nested_params.name: kubernetesVersions
nested_params.description: The Kubernetes versions to use to filter the insights.

nested_params.name: statuses
nested_params.description: The statuses to use to filter the insights.

nested_items.name: kubernetesVersion
nested_items.description: The Kubernetes minor version associated with an insight if applicable.

nested_items.name: lastRefreshTime
nested_items.description: The time Amazon EKS last successfully completed a refresh of this insight check on the cluster.

nested_items.name: lastTransitionTime
nested_items.description: The time the status of the insight last changed.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the insight which includes alert criteria, remediation recommendation, and additional resources (contains Markdown).

nested_items.name: insightStatus
nested_items.description: An object containing more detail on the status of the insight.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: Explanation on the reasoning for the status of the resource.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The nextToken value to include in a future ListInsights request. When the results of a ListInsights request exceed maxResults, you can use this value to retrieve the next page of results. This value is null when there are no more results to return.
